properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
FRENCH GUIANA.
DNC 14.
19 METER F/V INTREPIDE, FIVE PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE IN
06-20N 052-18W AT 122000Z JUN. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF
POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024, TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 5965 9670 9292, FAX: 5965 9663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
